amendment.description: To set forth trade policy, negotiating objectives, and congressional oversight requirements relating to the response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1975, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 204.

action.text: Amendment SA 1975 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3407-3408; text: CR S3401-3402) To set forth trade policy, negotiating objectives, and congressional oversight requirements relating to the response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1975, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 204.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1975, under the order of 5/25/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 204.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1975 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 1502.
